category; genus (taxonomy); family members; dependents; to belong to; subordinate to; affiliated with; be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals); to be; to prove to be; to constitute

to join together; to fix one's attention on; to concentrate on

rtega_mnemonic:
屬屬RS
属属		class, category, type, belong to
  • different classes or categories of insects 蜀: some living in water 氺 others feeding on corpses 尸
  • ⓢ different corpses 尸 of insects 禹: all ordered according to class and category to which they belong
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 属)
Pictophonetic: 禹 indicates the sound; 尸 (body) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
屬於 [ shǔ yú ]: to be classified as; to belong to; to be part of
屬意 [ zhǔ yì ]: to set one's heart on; to set one's choice on
屬文 [ zhǔ wén ]: to write prose

heisig_chinese_memo: The animal rights group shows up with their flag whenever someone is poaching the special snowflake butterfly with their butterfly net. "This butterfly doesn't belong to you" they say.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: These bugs BELONG TO an extremist group promoting insect independence. They are parading the FLAG of their group, the Nationalist GNATS, and wearing explosives BELTS for their planned terrorist war.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription from the " tail " to the sound of " Shu ". The original meaning is unknown. The original meaning of doubt is continuous (Xu Shen). The tail of the animal is connected to the body, so the " tail " means continuous (Xu Kai). Xu Kai "Shuowen Jiezi Biography": "Genus, continuous, if the tail is in the body." "Shuowen": "Belonging, even. From the end, the sound of Shu."

The tail of an animal is not only connected to the body, but also has an attachment relationship (the smaller tail is attached to the larger body), so " genus " also means attachment. By extension, there are category, affiliation, subordination, subordination, subordinates, subordinates, relatives, and family members.

Inscriptions on gold indicate that it is used as the name of an official house or an administrative organization, and it is suspected of being attached to it. "Subordinate state" is the name of Qin's central government, and it is an institution that manages the surrounding ethnic minorities. The Qin Bamboo Slips in the Sleeping Tiger Land have "subordinate states" law. "Subordinate State" was renamed "Subordinate State" in the Han Dynasty in order to avoid the taboo of the great patriarch Liu Bang, "Han Shu. "Bao Guan Gong Qing Biao": "Classic belonged to the country, Qin official, the hand of barbarians who descended."

The " genus " in the silk script of the Han Dynasty means "躅", and the silk book "Sixty-Four Hexagrams." "Dog (姤)": "Yi Zhu (豕) Fu (Fu) suitable (蹢) genus." The "genus" in the current edition of "Yi" is used as "躅". "Xunzi. Li Lun": "Hesitating and Hearing". "Book of Rites. "Three Years Questions" is written as "Like Yan". "Walking" means the appearance of lingering.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription from the " tail " to the sound of " Shu ", the original meaning of doubt is continuous, and the animal's tail is connected to the body, so the " tail " means continuous.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「尾」，「蜀」聲，初義不明，疑本義為連續(許慎)，動物的尾巴與身體相連，故從「尾」有連續之意(徐鍇)。徐鍇《說文解字繫傳》：「屬，相連續，若尾之在體。」《說文》：「屬，連也。从尾，蜀聲。」

　　動物的尾巴與身體不但相連，而且有附屬關係(較小的尾巴附着於較大的身體)，故「屬」又有附屬之意。引申之，又有類屬、歸屬、從屬、統屬、下屬、部屬、親屬、家屬。

　　金文表示用作官府名、行政機構名，疑取附屬之意，少府矛：「武庫受(授)屬邦」。「屬邦」是秦的中央官府名，是管理周邊少數民族的機構。睡虎地秦簡有〈屬邦〉律文。「屬邦」在漢代為了避高祖劉邦諱，改稱為「屬國」，《漢書．百官公卿表》：「典屬國，秦官，掌蠻夷降者。」

　　漢帛書「屬」通假為「躅」，馬王堆帛書《六十四卦．狗(姤)》：「羸豨(豕)復(孚)適(蹢)屬。」今本《易》「屬」作「躅」。《荀子．禮論》：「躑躅焉」。《禮記．三年問》作「蹢䠱焉」。「躑躅」表示徘徊不前的樣子。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「尾」，「蜀」聲，疑本義為連續，動物的尾巴與身體相連，故從「尾」有連續之意。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
屬 (Simplified: 属)
Total strokes: 21; Radical: 尸
Pictophonetic: 禹 indicates the sound; 尸 (body) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 尸 [ shī ] body, corpse
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 氺 [ shui ]
      • 蜀 [ shǔ ] the name of an ancient state
  • Pinyin: shǔ

    English Definition: category; genus (taxonomy); family members; dependents; to belong to; subordinate to; affiliated with; be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals); to be; to prove to be; to constitute
    Example Words:
    屬於 [ shǔ yú ]: to be classified as; to belong to; to be part of
    More: 屬* | *屬 | *屬*
  • Pinyin: zhǔ

    English Definition: to join together; to fix one's attention on; to concentrate on
    Example Words:
    屬意 [ zhǔ yì ]: to set one's heart on; to set one's choice on
    屬文 [ zhǔ wén ]: to write prose
    More: 屬* | *屬 | *屬*

屬屬RS
属属 		class, category, type, belong to
  • different classes or categories of insects 蜀: some living in water 氺 others feeding on corpses 尸

(Simplified: 属)
Pictophonetic: 禹 indicates the sound; 尸 (body) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 尸 [ shī ] body, corpse
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 氺 [ shui ]
      • 蜀 [ shǔ ] the name of an ancient state
①同一家族的：親屬。眷屬。烈屬。
②類別：金屬。吾屬。
③有管轄關係的，歸類：屬於。屬下。屬地。歸屬。直屬。附屬。隸屬。
④生物羣分類系統上，“科”下有“屬”，“屬”下有“種”。
⑤系，是：屬實。純屬謠言。
⑥用十二生肖記生年：屬相。
屬於 [ shǔ yú ]: to be classified as; to belong to; to be part of
①連綴，接連：屬文。屬和。
②(意念)集中於一點：屬仰(注視仰望)。屬望。屬意。
③古同“囑”，囑咐，託付。
④傾注，引申爲勸酒：“舉酒屬客”。
⑤恰好遇到：屬京師亂。
屬意 [ zhǔ yì ]: to set one's heart on; to set one's choice on
屬文 [ zhǔ wén ]: to write prose

Chinese: The animal rights group shows up with their flag whenever someone is poaching the special snowflake butterfly with their butterfly net. "This butterfly doesn't belong to you" they say.
Meaning: belong to
Hanzi: 属
Story: These bugs BELONG TO an extremist group promoting insect independence. They are parading the FLAG of their group, the Nationalist GNATS, and wearing explosives BELTS for their planned terrorist war.
Kind: traditional

金文從「 尾 」，「 蜀 」聲，初義不明，疑本義為連續(許慎)，動物的尾巴與身體相連，故從「 尾 」有連續之意(徐鍇)。徐鍇《說文解字繫傳》：「屬，相連續，若尾之在體。」《說文》：「屬，連也。从尾，蜀聲。」 動物的尾巴與身體不但相連，而且有附屬關係(較小的尾巴附着於較大的身體)，故「 屬 」又有附屬之意。引申之，又有類屬、歸屬、從屬、統屬、下屬、部屬、親屬、家屬。 金文表示用作官府名、行政機構名，疑取附屬之意，少府矛：「武庫受(授)屬邦」。「屬邦」是秦的中央官府名，是管理周邊少數民族的機構。睡虎地秦簡有〈屬邦〉律文。「屬邦」在漢代為了避高祖劉邦諱，改稱為「屬國」，《漢書．百官公卿表》：「典屬國，秦官，掌蠻夷降者。」 漢帛書「 屬 」通假為「 躅 」，馬王堆帛書《六十四卦．狗(姤)》：「羸豨(豕)復(孚)適(蹢)屬。」今本《易》「 屬 」作「 躅 」。《荀子．禮論》：「躑躅焉」。《禮記．三年問》作「蹢䠱焉」。「躑躅」表示徘徊不前的樣子。
Elaboration: The inscription from the " tail" to the sound of " Shu". The original meaning is unknown. The original meaning of doubt is continuous (Xu Shen). The tail of the animal is connected to the body, so the " tail" means continuous (Xu Kai). Xu Kai "Shuowen Jiezi Biography": "Genus, continuous, if the tail is in the body." "Shuowen": "Belonging, even. From the end, the sound of Shu." The tail of an animal is not only connected to the body, but also has an attachment relationship (the smaller tail is attached to the larger body), so " genus" also means attachment. By extension, there are category, affiliation, subordination, subordination, subordinates, subordinates, relatives, and family members. Inscriptions on gold indicate that it is used as the name of an official house or an administrative organization, and it is suspected of being attached to it. "Subordinate state" is the name of Qin's central government, and it is an institution that manages the surrounding ethnic minorities. The Qin Bamboo Slips in the Sleeping Tiger Land have "subordinate states" law. "Subordinate State" was renamed "Subordinate State" in the Han Dynasty in order to avoid the taboo of the great patriarch Liu Bang, "Han Shu. "Bao Guan Gong Qing Biao": "Classic belonged to the country, Qin official, the hand of barbarians who descended." The " genus" in the silk script of the Han Dynasty means " 躅", and the silk book "Sixty-Four Hexagrams." "Dog (姤)": "Yi Zhu (豕) Fu (Fu) suitable (蹢) genus." The "genus" in the current edition of "Yi" is used as " 躅". "Xunzi. Li Lun": "Hesitating and Hearing". "Book of Rites. "Three Years Questions" is written as "Like Yan". 屬字的基本解释

屬
shǔ

屬
zhǔ
均见“属”。

屬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔ］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
“属1”的繁体字。
(1)继续；联接。
(2)注入；斟酒相劝。
(3)注目；专注。
(4)委托；嘱咐。
(5)依托；寄托。
(6)推托；委弃。参见“屬疾”、“屬國”。
(7)满足。参见“屬厭”。
(8)佩带；带。
(9)接触。
(10)聚集；会合。
(11)撰写；纂辑。
(12)正，恰。
(13)刚，新近。
(14)适逢。
(15)量词。特指成套的铠甲。
(16)通“劚”。
[②]［shǔ］
［《廣韻》市玉切，入燭，禪。］
亦作“1”。“属2”的繁体字。
(1)种类。
(2)特指牲类。
(3)亲属。
(4)侪辈。指同一类人。
(5)官属；部属。
(6)归属；隶属。
(7)系；是。
(8)特指在十二属相中的归属。
(9)古代行政区划。
(10)生物分类系统上所用的等级之一。动植物分类以种为单位，相近的种合为属，相近的属合为科。

屬字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屬； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页304第07
【廣韻】【集韻】之欲切【韻會】朱玉切，?音燭。【說文】連也。从尾蜀聲。【徐曰】屬，相連續，若尾之在體，故从尾。【廣韻】聚也，會也。【周禮·州長】正月之吉，各屬其州之民而讀灋。註屬聚也。【孟子】乃屬其耆老而告之。　又托也，付也。【左傳·隱三年】宋穆公疾，召大司馬孔父，而屬殤公焉。【史記·留侯世家】漢王之將，獨韓信可屬大事，當一面。　又恭也。【禮·禮器】屬屬乎其忠也。【註】屬屬，恭貌。　又續也。【史記·信陵君傳】平原君使者，冠蓋相屬於魏。　又【晉語】必屬怨焉。【註】屬，結也。　又足也。【左傳·昭二十八年】願以小人之腹，爲君子之心，屬厭而已。【註】屬，足也，言小人知厭足，君子當亦然。　又【左傳·僖二十三年】其左執鞭弭，右屬櫜鞬，以與君周旋。【註】著也。【周禮·冬官考工記】察車之道，欲其樸屬而微至。【註】附著堅固也。　又恤也。【書·梓材】至于敬寡，至于屬婦。【傳】屬，存恤也。婦，婦妾也。　又甲札之數。【前漢·?法志】魏氏武卒，衣三屬之甲。【如淳註】上身一

暂无。

Belong to
Basic explanation of words
Belong to
shǔ
Belong to
zhǔ
See "genus" for both.
Belong to
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhǔ]
[The desire to cut in "Guang Yun", into the candle, chapter. ]
Traditional characters of "属1".
(1) Continue; connect.
(2) Inject; pour wine to persuade each other.
(3) Attention; focus.
(4) Entrust; ask.
(5) Reliance; sustenance.
(6) Dodge; abandon. See "belonging to disease", "belonging to country".
(7) Satisfaction. See "belonging to disgust".
(8) Wear; bring.
(9) Contact.
(10) Gather; rendezvous.
(11) Compose; edit.
(12) Positive, just.
(13) Just recently.
(14) It's a coincidence.
(15) Quantifiers. Especially refers to a complete set of armor.
(16) Through "劚".
[②] [shǔ]
["Guangyun" City jade cut, candle, Zen. ]
Also known as "1". Traditional characters of "属2".
(1) Type.
(2) Specifically refers to animals.
(3) Relatives.
(4) The peers. Refers to the same kind of people.
(5) Officials; subordinates.
(6) Attribution; affiliation.
(7) Department; Yes.
(8) Specifically refers to the belonging in the twelve zodiac signs.
(9) Ancient administrative divisions.
(10) One of the levels used in the biological classification system. Animal and plant classification is based on species, similar species are combined into genera, and similar genera are combined into families.
Belong to

[First Collection of Yin] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　属; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 304 No. 07

[Guangyun] Gathering, meeting also. 【Zhou Li·Governor】The good luck of the first month is read by the people of their respective states. [Historical Records·Liuhou Family] General of the King of Han, Han Xin alone can be a major issue.　Gong Ye. 【Ritual·Ritual Vessel】It belongs to its loyalty. [Note] Belonging to genus, respectful appearance.　Continued again.
